metadata.job_to_be_done: Prepare a literature review focusing on methodologies, datasets, and performance benchmarks

sections.title: Compliance Training Manual
sections.text: Compliance Training Manual Welcome to Compliance Training This training manual is designed to help employees understand compliance policies. Compliance Procedures 1. Report suspicious activity 2. Mandatory training modules 3. Regular audits 4. Whistleblower protection Regulatory Overview This section covers the laws and acts that govern corporate compliance.
